snippet: Saudi security forces arrested a suspect who was a former colleague of the victims, military contractors with Vinnell Arabia.
abstract: Two American employees of United States military contractor Vinnell Arabia are shot in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, with one dying of his wounds; Saudi security forces arrest dual Saudi-American citizen Abdulaziz Fahad Abdulaziz Alrashid in connection with the attack, which comes amid heightened concerns about possible reprisals by Islamic State militants.

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and MICHAEL R. GORDON
byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard reported from Beirut, and Michael R. Gordon from Paris. Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Saudi security forces arrested a suspect who was a former colleague of the victims, military contractors with Vinnell Arabia.

headline.main: American Is Fatally Shot in Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: American Is Fatally Shot in Saudi Arabia

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
